card.name: Armageddon
card.text: After each successful run on R&D, you may choose to give the Corp a Doom counter instead of accessing cards from R&D. Each Doom counter forces the Corp to roll a die whenever it installs a card. On a 6, the card is trashed after it is installed, and the Corp removes a Doom counter. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions.

card.name: Big Frackin' Gun
card.text: {6}: Break up to five sentry subroutines on a single piece of ice. {1}: +1 strength

card.name: Black Widow
card.text: {1}: Break sentry subroutine. {2}: +1 strength Choose an installed piece of ice when you install Black Widow. Black Widow gets +5 strength during each encounter with that piece of ice.

card.name: Boring Bit
card.text: {2}: Break wall subroutine. {1}: +1 strength

card.name: Bulldozer
card.text: {1}: Break wall subroutine. {2}: +1 strength If Bulldozer breaks all the subroutines of a wall, and the next piece of ice encountered during this run is a sentry, break one of the subroutines of that sentry, at no cost. Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Bulldozer, lose a total of {2} from stealth cards.

card.name: Corrosion
card.text: {0}: Break wall subroutine. {1}: +1 strength

card.name: Crumble
card.text: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Crumble counter. Two or more Crumble counters allow you trash, at no cost, any cards accessed from HQ, even if the cards cannot normally be trashed. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions.

card.name: Disintegrator
card.text: {2}: Derez a piece of ice and end your run. Use this ability only when you have just broken all the subroutines of that piece of ice and have successfully passed it.

card.name: Enterprise, Inc., Shields
card.text: {1}: Prevent up to 2 Net damage. {1}: Prevent 1 brain damage.

card.name: Forward's Legacy
card.text: {0}: Break sentry subroutine. At the start of each run, roll a die and add the result to Legacy 's strength for that run.

card.name: Fubar
card.text: {1}: Break a subroutine of the type chosen for Fubar. {2}: +1 strength {0}: Choose whether Fubar breaks code gates, sentries, or walls. Use this ability only once. Whenever you break an ice subroutine with Fubar, lose {1} from a stealth card.

card.name: Garbage In
card.text: After each successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Garbage counter. Two or more Garbage counters allow you to trash, at no cost, any cards accessed from R&D, even if the cards cannot normally be trashed. The Corp loses two Garbage counters after any run during which this ability is used. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions.

card.name: Highlighter
card.text: After each successful run on R&D, give the Corp a Highlighter counter. Each Highlighter counter after the first allows you to access an additional card from R&D whenever you access cards from R&D. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions.

card.name: Lockjaw
card.text: {T}: Give one of your icebreakers +2 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only during an encounter with a piece of ice.

card.name: Morphing Tool
card.text: {2}: Break a subroutine of the type last chosen for Morphing Tool. {1}: +1 strength {1}, A: Choose whether Morphing Tool breaks code gates, sentries, or walls. When you install Morphing Tool, choose whether it breaks code gates, sentries, or walls.

card.name: Redecorator
card.text: {1}: Break up to two sentry subroutines on a single piece of ice. {3}: +1 strength

card.name: Scaldan
card.text: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Scaldan counter. Each Scaldan counter forces the Corp to roll a die at the start of each of its turns. On a 5 or a 6, the Corp gains 1 Bad Publicity point. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time. {cyan} Revised/UK: Unique.

card.name: Skeleton Passkeys
card.text: {0}: Break code gate subroutine. {3}: +4 strength

card.name: Skullcap
card.text: T: Prevent any amount of Net or brain damage.

card.name: Taxman
card.text: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Tax counter. Every two Tax counters cause the Corp to lose {1} at the start of each of its turns. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions.

card.name: Vienna 22
card.text: After each successful run on HQ, give the Corp a Vienna counter. Each Vienna counter allows you to access an additional card from HQ whenever you access cards from HQ. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions.

card.name: Viral Pipeline
card.text: After each successful run on Archives, HQ, or R&D, put a Socket counter in that data fort. Socket counter from Archives, Socket counter from HQ, and Socket counter from R&D: Give the Corp a Pipe counter. Each Pipe counter causes the Corp to forgo an action at the start of each of its turns. The Corp may remove all Virus counters at any time, but must then forgo its next three actions. {cyan} Revised/UK: Unique.

card.name: Wrecking Ball
card.text: {0}: Break wall subroutine. {2}: +1 strength Whenever you break a wall subroutine with Wrecking Ball, lose {1} from a stealth card.

card.name: All-Hands
card.text: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, access three additional cards from HQ. You cannot use noisy icebreakers during the run.

card.name: Blackmail
card.text: Make a run on HQ. If run is successful, do not access cards from HQ; instead, score 1 agenda point.

card.name: Cruising for Netwatch
card.text: Gain {1} and draw two cards.

card.name: Decoy Signal
card.text: Make a run. Whenever you approach an unrezzed piece of ice during that run, expose it. You may jack out before the Corp decides whether to rez the ice.

card.name: Demolition Run
card.text: Make a run. If run is successful, do not access cards; instead, trash all rezzed ice on the fort on which you just made a run, and the Corp gives you three tags.

card.name: Disgruntled Ice Technician
card.text: Make a run. After passing a piece of ice during this run, you may derez that ice and end your run if you broke all the subroutines of that ice.

card.name: Drone for a Day
card.text: Gain {9} and the Corp gives you a tag.

card.name: Faked Hit
card.text: Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point. Take 2 brain damage. This damage cannot be prevented. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time. {cyan} UK: May only be played once per game (no matter how many you have in your deck).

card.name: Frame-Up
card.text: Play only if you made a successful run on both HQ and R&D this turn. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point. Give the Corp 1 additional Bad Publicity point if you liberated or trashed any Black Ops cards during those runs. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: Hijack
card.text: Install a program or a piece of hardware. Gain {3}, which you may use only to pay for its installation cost. Return to the bank any of the {3} you did not spend.

card.name: Ice and Data Special Report
card.text: Expose up to five cards installed in or on a single data fort.

card.name: Identity Donor
card.text: Do not play Identity Donor as an action; instead, play it during the Corp 's turn when you would suffer meat damage. Prevent that meat damage and give the Corp 2 Bad Publicity points. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: Live News Feed
card.text: Make a run. If run is successful, the Corp gives you two tags, and you give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point for each black ice you encountered during the run, 1 for each Black Ops card the Corp rezzed during the run, and 1 for each Black Ops agenda you liberated during the run. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: On the Fast Track
card.text: Gain {8} if you trashed an advertisement card this turn, or gain {6} if you trashed a transactions card this turn.

card.name: The Personal Touch
card.text: Put a +1 strength counter on an icebreaker.

card.name: Pirate Broadcast
card.text: Make a run on each data fort. Score 1 agenda point if all the runs are successful. Forgo your next action if any of the runs are not successful.

card.name: Poisoned Water Supply
card.text: Play only if you have at least two connections in play. Trash two connections. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time. {cyan} UK: May only be played once per game (no matter how many you have in your deck).

card.name: Prearranged Drop
card.text: The next time you access an agenda this turn, gain {6}.

card.name: Promises, Promises
card.text: The next time you access an agenda this turn, score 1 additional agenda point.

card.name: Reconnaissance
card.text: Make a run. Whenever the Corp rezzes a card during that run, gain {1}.

card.name: Remote Detonator
card.text: Play only if you made a successful run on a data fort this turn. Trash all rezzed ice on that fort, and the Corp gives you three tags.

card.name: Rush Hour
card.text: Make a run on R&D. If run is successful, access three additional cards from R&D. You cannot use noisy icebreakers during the run.

card.name: Senatorial Field Trip
card.text: Play only if the Corp rezzed a piece of Black Ice this turn. The Corp either derezzes that piece of ice or receives 2 Bad Publicity points. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: Stakeout
card.text: Gain {2} and draw one card.

card.name: Subliminal Corruption
card.text: Make a run. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point for each advertisement you trash during the run. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: Test Spin
card.text: Search your stack for a program, and install it, at no cost. Shuffle your stack. If you install a program in this way, make a run. After the run, shuffle the program into your stack, unless it is no longer in play, in which case, lose {4} plus its installation cost. If this is more than the number of bits in your pool, suffer the difference in meat damage.

card.name: Weefle Initiation
card.text: Make a run. Prevent up to 7 damage during that run.

card.name: Airport Locker
card.text: {5}, {T}: Search your stack for a program, and install that program, if you can. Shuffle your stack afterwards. You may use this ability during an encounter with a piece of ice. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Back Door to Netwatch
card.text: {3}, {T}: Cancel the effect of a successful trace. Give the Corp 1 Bad Publicity point if the trace would have had an effect other than or in addition to giving you any tags. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: Back Door to Rivals
card.text: {0}: Base link 2 {3}: +1 link Gain {1} whenever you successfully use Back Door to Rivals to avoid a trace. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

card.name: Bargain with Viacox
card.text: After the turn in which you install Viacox, you gain an action during each of your turns, which you must take if possible. Roll a die at the start of each of your turns to find out what the action is. On a 1, draw a card. On a 2, gain {1}. On a 3, make a run on R&D. On a 4, make a run on HQ. On a 5, make a run on a subsidiary data fort. On a 6, reveal a card to the Corp at random from your hand, and play or install that card.

card.name: Bolt-Hole
card.text: {T}: Prevent 2 meat damage. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Chiba Bank Account
card.text: {1}, {T}: Gain {4}. You may use this ability whenever you pay any cost or penalty. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Cortical Cybermodem
card.text: Provides +2 MU and +2 hand size. Put {2} from the bank on Cortical Cybermodem when it is installed. Use these bits only to pay for using icebreakers during runs. If you use any of these bits, replace them from the bank at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

card.name: Cortical Stimulators
card.text: Prevents 1 Net or brain damage each turn.

card.name: Credit Subversion
card.text: {T}: The Corp loses {3}. Use this ability immediately after a successful run on HQ. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Death from Above
card.text: {T}: Trash, at no cost, all cards installed in a subsidiary data fort, even if they cannot normally be trashed. Use this ability only when you have just successfully made a run on that fort, and before accessing cards from that fort. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: The Deck
card.text: {0}: Base link 5 {1}: +1 link Provides +1 MU. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

card.name: Eurocorpse{TM} Spin Chip
card.text: Put {2} from the bank on Spin Chip when it is installed. Spin Chip can have an icebreaker installed in it whose MU cost is no greater than 1. Use the bits on Spin Chip only to pay for using this icebreaker during runs. If you use any of these bits, replace them from the bank at the start of your next turn.

card.name: Expendable Family Member
card.text: {1}, {T}: Avoid receiving a tag. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Get Ready to Rumble
card.text: {T}: The Corp discards two cards at random from HQ. Use this ability only when the Corp successfully does meat damage. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: HQ Mole
card.text: {4}, {T}: Access two additional cards from HQ. Use this ability only when accessing cards from HQ. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Liberated Savings Account
card.text: {7}, {T}: Gain {11}. You may use this ability whenever you pay any cost or penalty. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Lucidrine{TM} Drip Feed
card.text: At the start of each of your turns, if there are two Drip counters on Drip Feed, remove all Drip counters from it and take 1 brain damage, which cannot be prevented; otherwise, put a Drip counter on Drip Feed and gain an action.

card.name: Mercenary Subcontract
card.text: {4}, {T}: Trash, at no cost, one or more cards that you are currently accessing, even if those cards cannot normally be trashed. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Precision Bribery
card.text: The Corp cannot create any new data forts. The Corp may trash Precision Bribery by taking an action to pay {4}. Only one unique card of a particular name can be in play at a time. If for some reason more than one is in play, trash all but one. {cyan} Revised/UK: Trashing in this way cannot be prevented.

card.name: R&D Mole
card.text: {4}, {T}: Access two additional cards from R&D. Use this ability only when accessing cards from R&D. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Runner Sensei
card.text: {2}: Base link 4 {2}: +1 link Gain {1} whenever you successfully use Runner Sensei to avoid a trace. Use only one base link card for each trace attempt made against you.

card.name: Simulacrum
card.text: {T}: Pass a piece of AP ice. You may use this ability during an encounter with a piece of ice. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Streetware Distributor
card.text: Take {1} from Streetware Distributor, if it has any bits, at the start of each of your turns. A: Put {3} from the bank on Streetware Distributor.

card.name: Sunburst Cranial Interface
card.text: Provides +1 MU and +1 hand size. Put {1} from the bank on Cranial Interface when it is installed. Use this bit only to pay for using icebreakers during runs, but not for using noisy icebreakers. If you use the bit, replace it from the bank at the start of your next turn. Only one deck can be in play at a time. Trash any older decks.

card.name: Swiss Bank Account
card.text: You may use the following abilities whenever you pay any cost or penalty. {T}: Gain {2}. {3}, {T}: Gain {6}. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: Time to Collect
card.text: {T}: Prevent one or more of your other installed resources from being trashed. Use this ability only during the Corp 's turn. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up. {cyan} UK: Trashing in this way cannot be prevented.

card.name: Wired Switchboard
card.text: {T}: +3 link. Use this ability only after you and the Corp have revealed how much each of you spent on the trace attempt. Hidden resources are installed face down, but are put into the trash face up.

card.name: AI Board Member
card.text: You may gain an action during each of your turns. At the start of each of your turns, roll a die to see what the action will be for that turn, and then decide whether to take it. On a 1, you may use the action only to install a card; on a 2 or 3, only to gain 1; on a 4, 5, or 6, only to draw a card.

card.name: Charity Takeover
card.text: Gain {9} and 1 Bad Publicity point. If the Corp has 7 or more Bad Publicity points, it loses the game, even if it fulfills victory conditions at the same time.

card.name: Corporate Headhunters
card.text: Whenever Corporate Headhunters successfully does damage, Runner 's hand size is reduced by 1. A: Do 1 meat damage. Use this ability only if Runner is tagged.

card.name: Fetal AI
card.text: When Runner accesses Fetal AI, do 2 Net damage, even if it is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses Fetal AI from the Archives. If Fetal AI is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you. Runner must pay 2 to steal Fetal AI, in addition to any other costs.

card.name: Marked Accounts
card.text: When Runner accesses Marked Accounts, give Runner a tag, even if it is not installed. If Marked Accounts is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

card.name: Please Don't Choke Anyone
card.text: For each 1 damage you successfully do, you may choose instead to prevent that damage and put a PDCA counter on Please Don 't Choke Anyone. PDCA counter: Gain an action. Use this ability only once per turn and only during your turn.

card.name: Project Venice
card.text: For every three advancement counters over Project Venice 's difficulty that are on Project Venice when you score it, gain an action during each of your turns.

card.name: Project Zurich
card.text: For every two advancement counters over Project Zurich 's difficulty that are on Project Zurich when you score it, gain 1 at the start of each of your turns.

card.name: Viral Breeding Ground
card.text: When you score Breeding Ground, trash all cards installed in or on the fort Breeding Ground was installed in. When Runner accesses Breeding Ground, choose up to two programs for each advancement counter on Breeding Ground; Runner brings those programs into his or her hand.

card.name: World Domination
card.text: Score an additional 4 agenda points when you score World Domination.

card.name: Brain Wash
card.text: {S}: Do 1 brain damage.

card.name: Bug Zapper
card.text: {S}: Do 2 Net damage for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Bug Zapper. {S}: End the run.

card.name: Caryatid
card.text: {S}: End the run. When you rez Caryatid, you may pay {1}, above the rez cost, to make it a code gate instead of a wall.

card.name: Chihuahua
card.text: {S}: Trace 1-If trace is successful, do 1 Net damage. Gain {2} when you rez Chihuahua.

card.name: Colonel Failure
card.text: {S}: Trash a program. {S}: Trash a program. {S}: Trash a program. {S}: End the run. {S}: End the run.

card.name: Coyote
card.text: {S}: For the remainder of the run, all further ice is encountered at +1 strength, unless Runner pays {2} while passing Coyote. Gain {3} when you rez Coyote.

card.name: Credit Blocks
card.text: {S}: End the run. When you rez Credit Blocks, you may pay {1}, above the rez cost, to make it a wall instead of a sentry.

card.name: Datacomb
card.text: {S}: End the run. If Runner passes Datacomb, pay {1}, or uninstall it and store it in HQ.

card.name: Death Yo-Yo
card.text: {S}: Do 1 brain damage. {S}: End the run. If Runner passes Death Yo-Yo, you may choose to uninstall it, store it in HQ, and gain {1}.

card.name: Digiconda
card.text: {S}: Do 2 Net damage. {S}: End the run. Pay [X], above the rez cost, when you rez Digiconda. X is Digiconda 's strength, and X cannot be greater than 6.

card.name: Dog Pile
card.text: {S}: Do 1 Net damage for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Dog Pile. {S}: End the run. Dog Pile has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside it.

card.name: Food Fight
card.text: Food Fight has one "{S}: End the run" subroutine for every {2} you pay, above the rez cost, when you rez it.

card.name: Galatea
card.text: {S}: End the run. When you rez Galatea, you may pay {1}, above the rez cost, to make it a code gate instead of a wall.

card.name: Gatekeeper
card.text: Gatekeeper has one "{S}: End the run" subroutine for every {2} you pay, above the rez cost, when you rez it.

card.name: Homing Missile
card.text: {S}: Trace x-If trace is successful, end the run, and Runner cannot make another run until Runner takes an action to pay {2}. Pay X, above the rez cost, when you rez Homing Missile. X is Homing Missile 's strength and trace limit, and X cannot be greater than 8.

card.name: Hunting Pack
card.text: For each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Hunting Pack, Hunting Pack has one subroutine as follows: "{S}: Trace 5-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag."

card.name: Iceberg
card.text: {S}: Do 1 Net damage. {S}: {2}: Iceberg has one "{S}: End the run" subroutine for the present encounter. Use this ability only when Runner encounters Iceberg.

card.name: Lesser Arcana
card.text: {S}: End the run. When you rez Lesser Arcana, you may pay 1, above the rez cost, to make it a wall instead of a sentry.

card.name: Marionette
card.text: {S}: Trash a program. {S}: End the run. If Runner passes Marionette, pay {1}, or uninstall it and store it in HQ.

card.name: Mastermind
card.text: {S}: Do 1 brain damage for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside Mastermind. {S}: End the run. Mastermind has +1 strength for each rezzed piece of ice installed outside it.

card.name: Minotaur
card.text: For each rezzed code gate or wall installed outside Minotaur, Minotaur has one "{S}: End the run" subroutine.

card.name: Misleading Access Menus
card.text: {S}: End the run unless Runner pays {1}. Gain {3} when you rez Misleading Access Menus.

card.name: Mobile Barricade
card.text: {S}: Do 1 Net damage. {S}: End the run. {1}: Move Mobile Barricade and insert it in a different position on this data fort. Use this ability only at the start of a run on this data fort. You may use this ability even if Mobile Barricade is unrezzed, in which case, you reveal it.

card.name: Riddler
card.text: {2}: Riddler has one "{S}: End the run" subroutine for the present encounter. Use this ability only when Runner encounters Riddler.

card.name: Roadblock
card.text: {S}: End the run. When Runner encounters Roadblock, roll a die. On a 6, derez Roadblock, and Runner automatically passes it; otherwise, add the result to Roadblock 's strength for that encounter.

card.name: Sandstorm
card.text: Sandstorm has one "{S}: End the run" subroutine for every {2} you pay, above the rez cost, when you rez it.

card.name: Scaffolding
card.text: {S}: End the run. If Runner passes Scaffolding, you may choose to uninstall it, store it in HQ, and gain {1}.

card.name: Snowbank
card.text: {S}: End the run unless Runner pays {1}. Gain {3} when you rez Snowbank.

card.name: Sphinx 2006
card.text: {S}: End the run. When you rez Sphinx 2006, you may pay {4}, above the rez cost, to make it a sentry instead of a code gate.

card.name: Sumo 2008
card.text: {S}: End the run. When you rez Sumo 2008, you may pay {1}, above the rez cost, to make it a wall instead of a sentry.

card.name: Toughonium{TM} Wall
card.text: {S}: End the run. {S}: End the run. {S}: End the run. {S}: End the run.

card.name: Tumblers
card.text: {S}: End the run. If Runner passes Tumblers, you may choose to uninstall it, store it in HQ, and gain {1}.

card.name: Twisty Passages
card.text: {S}: End the run. If Runner passes Twisty Passages, pay {1}, or uninstall it and store it in HQ.

card.name: Walking Wall
card.text: {S}: End the run. {1}: Move Walking Wall and insert it in a different position on this data fort. Use this ability only at the start of a run on this data fort. You may use this ability even if Walking Wall is unrezzed, in which case, you reveal it.

card.name: Washed-Up Solo Construct
card.text: {S}: Trash a program unless Runner pays {1}. Gain {3} when you rez Washed-Up Solo Construct.

card.name: Corporate Guard Temps
card.text: Pay two times [X] when you play Corporate Guard Temps, to gain an action during each of your next X turns. Forfeit the next [X] you gain.

card.name: Credit Consolidation
card.text: Gain {15}.

card.name: Data Sifters
card.text: Play only if Runner trashed any nodes during his or her last turn. Give Runner a tag.

card.name: Emergency Rig
card.text: Rez a piece of ice, at no cost. Put X Kludge counters on that piece of ice; X cannot be 0. At the start of each of your turns, remove a Kludge counter. Trash that piece of ice when the last Kludge counter is removed from it.

card.name: Manhunt
card.text: Play only if Runner attempted a run during his or her last turn. Trace 6-If trace is successful, give Runner one tag for each point by which your trace exceeded his or her link.

card.name: Rent-to-Own Contract
card.text: Rez a piece of ice, at no cost. Put on that ice a number of Term counters equal to its rez cost. At the start of each of your turns, if you have at least {2}, lose {2} and remove one of these Term counters; otherwise, put a Term counter on that piece of ice.

card.name: Schlaghund Pointers
card.text: Play only if Runner has attempted a run this game. Trace 3-If trace is successful, give Runner a tag. Pay {1}, in addition to the normal cost, for each point of trace above 0.

card.name: Underworld Mole
card.text: Play only if Runner installed any resources during his or her last turn. Trace 4-If trace is successful, trash a resource Runner installed during his or her last turn and give Runner a tag.

card.name: Bel-Digmo Antibody
card.text: Shuffle Bel-Digmo Antibody into R&D when it is rezzed. When Runner accesses Bel-Digmo Antibody from R&D, do 1 Net damage, and Runner must show it to you.

card.name: Cybertech Think Tank
card.text: You may advance Cybertech Think Tank before and after you rez it. Cybertech Think Tank advancement counter: Increase by 1 the meat damage dealt by another source.

card.name: Department of Misinformation
card.text: You may rez Department of Misinformation when Runner attempts to expose a card. {1}: Prevent a card from being exposed.

card.name: Doppelganger Antibody
card.text: When Runner accesses Doppelganger Antibody, you may pay {2} to give Runner a Doppelganger counter, even if Doppelganger is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses Doppelganger from the Archives. Each Doppelganger counter causes Runner to lose {1} at the start of each of his or her turns. Runner may take an action to pay {4} to remove a Doppelganger counter. If Doppelganger is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

card.name: Executive Boot Camp
card.text: Discard a card at random: Gain {2}. Use this ability only during a run. At the end of the run, return to the bank any of the {2} you did not spend.

card.name: Government Contract
card.text: You may advance Government Contract before and after you rez it. Government Contract advancement counter: Gain {3}. Use these bits only to pay for installing or rezzing cards. When the turn ends, return to the bank any of the {3} you did not spend.

card.name: Herman Revista
card.text: {0}: Rearrange the ice installed on this fort. Use this ability only at the start of a run on this data fort.

card.name: LDL Traffic Analyzers
card.text: You may advance LDL Traffic Analyzers before and after you rez it. You may rez LDL Traffic Analyzers during a trace attempt. LDL Traffic Analyzers advancement counter: Gain {5}. Use this ability only during a trace attempt. When the trace attempt ends, return to the bank any of the {5} you did not spend.

card.name: Lesley Major
card.text: Install Lesley Major only in a subsidiary data fort. {5}: Add two advancement counters, at no cost, to a card installed in this data fort. Use this ability only when Runner passes the last piece of ice on this fort, and only once per run.

card.name: Lisa Blight
card.text: {1}, Discard a card at random: Repeat one subroutine on a piece of ice on this fort, until the end of the run. Treat the copy of the subroutine as if it appeared immediately after the original subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.

card.name: Marcel DeSoleil
card.text: {2}, Trash the top two cards stored in R&D: Repeat one subroutine on a piece of ice on this fort, until the end of the run. Treat the copy of the subroutine as if it appeared immediately after the original subroutine. Use this ability only during a run.

card.name: Networked Center
card.text: The difficulty of Gray Ops agendas installed in this fort is reduced by 1. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

card.name: Obfuscated Fortress
card.text: At the start of a run on this fort, Runner must announce the number of bits he or she will spend during the run. Runner cannot spend more than this during that run. If Runner does not spend that many bits during that run, the Runner loses the remainder once the run is complete. You may rez Obfuscated Fortress at the start of a run on this fort.

card.name: Panic Button
card.text: Install Panic Button only in HQ. {1}: Draw a card. Use this ability only during a run on HQ.

card.name: Pattel Antibody
card.text: When Runner accesses Pattel Antibody, you may pay {3} to put a Pattel counter on all installed icebreakers, even if Pattel Antibody is not installed. Ignore this effect if Runner accesses Pattel Antibody from the Archives. Each Pattel counter on an icebreaker reduces its strength by 1. If Pattel Antibody is accessed from R&D, Runner must show it to you.

card.name: Pavit Bharat
card.text: Install Pavit only in a subsidiary data fort. When you rez Pavit, uninstall all cards installed in this fort and store them in HQ. Install an equal number of cards from HQ in this fort. Rez Pavit only when Runner has passed the last piece of ice on this fort.

card.name: Rasmin Bridger
card.text: After Runner passes each piece of ice on this fort, Runner must pay {1} or end the run.

card.name: Raymond Ellison
card.text: Install Raymond Ellison only in a subsidiary data fort. {T}: Remove any number of advancement counters from cards installed in this data fort. Gain {3} for each advancement counter removed. Use this ability only during a run. At the end of the run, return to the bank any of the bits gained that you did not spend.

card.name: Research Bunker
card.text: The difficulty of research agendas installed in this fort is reduced by 1. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.

card.name: Simon Francisco
card.text: Install Simon Francisco only in R&D or HQ. During a run in which Simon is accessed, Runner accesses one less card stored in this fort.

card.name: Siren
card.text: Rez Siren when you install it. Install Siren only if you can pay to rez it. {1}: Runner must make a run on the fort Siren is installed in, if possible, instead of on the fort he or she was originally going to make a run on. Use this ability only at the start of a run.

card.name: Stereogram Antibody
card.text: When Runner accesses Stereogram Antibody from the Archives, do 1 Net damage and shuffle Stereogram Antibody into R&D.

card.name: Syd Meyer Superstores
card.text: A: Trash a rezzed piece of ice. Gain {4}.

card.name: Weapons Depot
card.text: The difficulty of Black Ops agendas installed in this fort is reduced by 1. Rez a region when you install it. Install a region only if you can pay to rez it. Only one region may be installed in each fort. Trash older ones.
